{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which marker is not expressed on the surface of T-cells at any stage of development, we need to review the information provided in the relevant documents. CD1a, CD34, and Tdt are mentioned in the documents as markers expressed on T-cells at different stages of development. However, PAX5 is not mentioned in any of the documents in relation to T-cell development. Therefore, the marker that is not expressed on the surface of T-cells at any stage of development is PAX5.", "answer_choice": "B"}
